Description:
1. Construct the Teatro di San Carlo: Shuffle the location deck and put the top 4 locations into play.
2. Shuffle the deck of Burden weaknesses and put 1 facedown at each location other than The Monument to the Mother.
3. If you have visited San Francisco, put 1 resource token on Flosshilde and Woglinde.
4. If you have visited Freiburg, put 1 resource token on Flosshilde and Wellgunde.
Name: Notecard
